We ask for the Government to ban use of guns, truncheons, water cannons, tear gas, pepper spray on the streets by our Police Forces routinely.

Truncheons causes bruising.  It will cost lives by being bruised.

Violence against Violence is not working and is ineffective.

We ask for a debate in the Houses of Commons and pass the motion through.

We agree that Firearms can only be used in exceptional cirumstances.

We agree that stun guns are the only answer as it does not harm or kill anyone.
